attributes.action: quit, unelected, not wanted, no good, highwayman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A boy goes to his Dad and asks, 'What is Politics and why is that Brown on the television again?' 

Dad says, 'Well son, let me try to explain it this way: 

I am the head of the family, so call me PM

Your Mum is the administrator of the money, so we call her the Government. 

We are here to take care of your needs, so we will call you the People. 

The Nan we will consider her the Working Class. 

And your Brother, we will call him the Future. 

Think about that and see if it makes sense.

The little boy goes off to bed thinking about what his Dad said. 

That night, he hears his Brother crying, so he gets up to check.

He finds that his Brother has soiled his nappy.

So the little boy goes to his parent's room and finds his mother asleep.  

Not wanting to wake her, he goes to the nanny's room. Finding the door locked, he peeks in the keyhole and sees his Dad in bed with the Nan

He gives up and goes back to bed. 

In the morning, the boy say's to his father, 'Dad, I think I understand the concept of politics now.' 

The Dad says, 'Good, tell me in your own words what you think politics is all about.' 

The boy replies, 'The PM is screwing the Working Class while the Government is sound asleep. The People are being ignored and the Future is in deep plop

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
